Uses of Package
org.jvoicexml.logging

Packages that use org.jvoicexml.logging
org.jvoicexml.logging The logging package provides the basic classes and interfaces to address logging issues. 
org.jvoicexml.logging.jvxml The jvxml package provides a baisc implementation for a Logger using log4j. 
 

Classes in org.jvoicexml.logging used by org.jvoicexml.logging
Logger
          Allows for users to implement their own logging mechanism.
 

Classes in org.jvoicexml.logging used by org.jvoicexml.logging.jvxml
Logger
          Allows for users to implement their own logging mechanism.
